name: Blood Money (itch) (kristinamay)
description:
This is a first chapter of what might be a longer game someday. For now, I feel good about getting this much done for Ludum Dare - especially since I couldn't work on it on Saturday at all! Future updates will hopefully have my own music created, too.

Strongly recommend playing full-screen, and it's not mobile-friendly at all.

Made using Squiffy.
